member.name: DATETIMEPICKERINFO
member.summary: Contains information about a date and time picker (DTP) control.

member.name: DATETIMEPICKERINFO.cbSize
member.summary: Set to sizeof(DATETIMEPICKERINFO). This member must be set before sending a pointer to this structure with the DTM_GETDATETIMEPICKERINFO message, or the macro.

member.name: DATETIMEPICKERINFO.rcCheck
member.summary: A structure describing location of checkbox. If a checkbox is displayed and checked, an edit control should be available to update the selected date-time value.

member.name: DATETIMEPICKERINFO.stateCheck
member.summary: The state of rcCheck—one of the Object State Constants, such as STATE_SYSTEM_CHECKED or STATE_SYSTEM_INVISIBLE.

member.name: DATETIMEPICKERINFO.rcButton
member.summary: A structure describing the location of a drop-down grid or up/down control.

member.name: DATETIMEPICKERINFO.stateButton
member.summary: The state of rcButton— one or a bitwise combination of the Object State Constants, such as STATE_SYSTEM_UNAVAILABLE, STATE_SYSTEM_INVISIBLE, or STATE_SYSTEM_PRESSED. If the up/down control is in use, the state of the button is STATE_SYSTEM_INVISIBLE.

member.name: DATETIMEPICKERINFO.hwndEdit
member.summary: A handle to the edit control. For information see, Edit Controls.

member.name: DATETIMEPICKERINFO.hwndUD
member.summary: A handle to the up/down control—an alternative to using the drop-down grid (looks like month calendar control). For more information, see Up-Down Controls.

member.name: DATETIMEPICKERINFO.hwndDropDown
member.summary: A handle to the drop-down grid.
